partitionedRegionQuerying

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • partitionedRegionQuerying.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    This example shows how to execute a query using function from a client by setting a filter in the function call.This client connects two servers with Partitioned region, inserts data and executes a query.

    See the README.html for instructions on how to run the example.

    Gemfire by default routes the data in a Partitioned Region using the keys. Since a function is used, the query gets routed to one server. The filter provided in the function call then routes the query to the bucket where the filter key exists on the server.
